comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of May 9, 1914 reports that a "delegation of visiting Shriners from California, dressed in full regalia, took part in pursuit of a young man who had been attempting to serve papers on an actress and was mistaken for a thief!! query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E04E0D71E39E633A...
